verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. The king <WH4428> shall joy <WH8055> in thy strength <WH5797>, O Jehovah <WH3068>; And in thy salvation <WH3444> how greatly <WH3966> shall he rejoice <WH1523>!
Thou hast given <WH5414> him his heart <WH3820>'s desire <WH8378>, And hast not withholden <WH4513> the request <WH782> of his lips <WH8193>. [Selah <WH5542>]
For thou meetest <WH6923> him with the blessings <WH1293> of goodness <WH2896>: Thou settest <WH7896> a crown <WH5850> of fine gold <WH6337> on his head <WH7218>.
He asked <WH7592> life <WH2416> of thee <WH5414>, thou gavest it him <WH753>, Even length of days <WH3117> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5769>.
His glory <WH3519> is great <WH1419> in thy salvation <WH3444>: Honor <WH1935> and majesty <WH1926> dost thou lay upon him <WH7737>.
For thou makest <WH7896> him most blessed <WH1293> for ever <WH5703>: Thou makest <WH7896> him glad <WH8057> with joy in thy presence <WH6440>.
For the king <WH4428> trusteth <WH982> in Jehovah <WH3068>; And through the lovingkindness <WH2617> of the Most High <WH5945> he shall not be moved <WH4131>.
Thy hand <WH3027> will find out <WH4672> all thine enemies <WH341>; Thy right hand <WH3225> will find out <WH4672> those that hate thee <WH8130>.

Thou wilt make <WH7896> them as a fiery <WH784> furnace <WH8574> in the time <WH6256> of thine anger <WH6440>: Jehovah <WH3068> will swallow them up <WH1104> in his wrath <WH639>, And the fire <WH784> shall devour them <WH398>.
Their fruit <WH6529> wilt thou destroy <WH6> from the earth <WH776>, And their seed <WH2233> from among the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>.
For they intended <WH5186> evil <WH7451> against thee <WH2803>; They conceived a device <WH4209> which they are not able to perform <WH3201>.
For thou wilt make <WH7896> them turn their back <WH7926>; Thou wilt make ready <WH3559> with thy bowstrings <WH4340> against their face <WH6440>.
Be thou exalted <WH7311>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, in thy strength <WH5797>: So will we sing <WH7891> and praise <WH2167> thy power <WH1369>.
